title: ONLY A Few 1 BR Left, Hurry Before They Are Gone! *Lyndale Gardens*
posting_body: ['***RENT SPECIAL: $400 RENT CREDIT + ADDTIONAL $100 IF YOU APPLY THE SAME DAY AS YOUR SHOWING!', '*** CALL TODAY FOR MORE DETAILS', '***Lyndale Garden Apartments***', '6315 Lyndale Ave South', 'Richfield, MN\xa0\xa055423', 'Lyndale Garden Apartments', 'Call Today:', 'show contact info', '1 BD / 1.0 BA STARTING AT $975', '(per month)', 'Deposit: $400.00', 'Square Footage: 510 - 590 sq.ft.', 'More Convenience, Quality and Value For Your Money!', 'Apartment Homes Lyndale Garden offers 1 bedroom apartments for rent in Richfield, MN located on 63rd and Lyndale Avenue South within walking distance to the HUB shopping center, restaurants, the bus line and much more.', 'Easy freeway access to downtown Minneapolis, Edina, Bloomington and Mall of America.', 'Our community features newly renovated one-bedroom apartment homes with brand new kitchen counter-tops, kitchen flooring, added bookcase, and select units have updated bathrooms!', 'Call today and let our professional staff give you a personal tour of the community including our beautiful remodeled apartments.', 'Lease Description', 'Month-to-Month With a 9 Month Clause', 'Directions', 'Please Call For Directions.', 'Apartment Pricing', '1 Bedroom- A', 'Beds:', '1', 'Full Baths:', '1', 'Half Baths:', '0', 'Sq ft:', '510', 'Rent:', '$975', 'Per Month', 'Deposit:', '400', '1 Bedroom-B', 'Beds:', '1', 'Full Baths:', '1', 'Half Baths:', '0', 'Sq ft:', '590', 'Rent:', '985', 'Per Month', 'Deposit:', '400', 'Apartment Features', 'Air Conditioning', 'Cable Ready', 'Ceiling Fan(s)', 'Gas Range', 'Hardwood Flooring', 'Oversized Closets', 'Some Paid Utilities', 'Refrigerator', 'Community Features', 'Emergency Maintenance', 'Laundry Facility', 'Public Transportation', 'Controlled Access', 'On Site Maintenance', 'On Site Management', 'Special Features', 'Cats Allowed', 'See notes in Lease Terms', 'Other Features', 'Accent wall colors', 'Heat, water, trash and cooking gas PAID By Mgmt.', 'Updated kitchens', 'Window coverings', '24-hour emergency assistance', 'Amazing professional staff', 'Office Hours', 'Sunday:', 'Monday:', '8:00-6:00', 'Tuesday:', '8:00-6:00', 'Wednesday:', '8:00-5:00', 'Thursday:', '8:00-6:00', 'Friday:', '8:00-6:00', 'Saturday:', '10:00-4:00', '*Prices and availability are subject to change at any time.']
